0: AND we got the hotel so my 3 kids could go swimming but when we got to the indoor pool it was ICE cold
Breakfast is not included parking is not included and the pool was not usable
After 40 minutes in the pool we had to jump out and make a run for it to our room
We stayed on a very cold weekend in February so it was freezing in the pool area
Do not stay in rooms on same side of building as the pool as it is very loud during times pool is open
LocationNo hot water after going for swim at 40 pm
No free internet as advertised freezing pool
I did use the pool which could have been cleaner

LocationRom very small not much space except for bed tv remote not functional there with my toddler daughter pool not heated and very cold need security or something in pool area to keep guests under control
Getting back I drew my curtains and took in my view of the indoor pool
1: All rooms on one side of the 6th floor look directly into the indoor pool which is in a covered building
If you have kids or are a kid at heart I would highly recommend this pool
We took off at 10 am for a swim meet
And they had a sun deck right off the pool and exercise area but no hot tub
2: Adults supervise their children by watching them from one of the 6 rooms on the 6th floor that overlooks the pool
This year tried their indoor pool
Saw beautiful lobby and nice outdoor pool
The heated pool is an amazing amenity
The next night we went to the pool
Everyone was extremely friendly and they took care of every request without delay from the front desk to dining to room service and the pool crew I can not say enough about the staff
the beds were really comfy and the pool area was pretty large just maybe needed a few more chairs
